name: Sentence Deduplication
short_description:
Identifying summary answers through removing redundant information from a large set of documents retrieved can help the clinician in decision making for patient care. Our approach for providing concise information to the clinicians consists of the four modules: answer extraction, sentence representation, similarity calculation and cluster identification. Assessment of our approach on treatment and diagnostic alternatives for congestive heart failure and atrial fibrillation showed high clustering values of 70%-84% on “overall similarity” evaluation and 75%-84% on F-measure evaluation.

The code will be available for free for academic purposes after the publication.
summary: Deduplication of clinical information retrieved by Clinical Question-a
